column4: Hey all i'm used to using fedora core but i thoguht i give kubuntu or ubuntu a try but i boot off the cd it takes so long i give up is there a way of installing of the cd without going in ubuntu thus saving me a one hour wait time?
There is an 'alternative install cd' that as far as I know uses the default debian installer.
and apokryphos thanks + i perfer to install manualy then waiting for it to load lol
